body:
Once upon a time, on the wonderful ages of MC Zone...

Blackhawk6alpha*, a well known and loved moderator/admin at the time, set up a contest. The contest consisted in building a faction hub with certain requirements. Some of them were that it should be centered with 0,0, multiple biomes around spawn, certain size, certain shops, etc.

This contest was supposed to be made for the new MC Zone faction server. Winner would get the Titan rank which was the same thing as diamond rank nowadays.

What happened to the contest?
body_tagged:

title: Does anyone remember the  faction contest?

replies.body:
Blackalpha... I dont know any Blackalpha's?

I know Blackhawk however...

replies.body: Considering MCZone was converted into Avicus, I'm guessing the contest never finished...
